content: body edge total row 7 ws p1 k1 p1 k1 sm p1 sm p4 sm p24 sm p4 sm p1 sm k1 p1 k1 4 108 4 120 p1 row 8 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 sm m1 k to one stitch before marker kfab sm kfab k to one stitch before marker kfab sm kfab k to one stitch before marker kfab sm kfab k to one stitch before marker kfab sm kfab k to marker m1 sm p1 k1 p1 k1 row 9 ws p1 k1 p1 k1 sm purl to last 4 slipping markers as you come to them sm k1 p1 k1 p1 repeat row 8 and 9 until you have the following stitch count edge front sleeve back sleeve front edge total 4 27 30 50 30 27 4 172 ~~© cathy rubin 2012 australia~~ page 4 of 7 body of cardigan please refer to reference section for tutorial on how to work these two cables without a cable needle if not working cables move to row 7 and 8 row 1 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 sm repeat first cable chart row to the next marker sm p1 k1 p1 k1 row 2 ws p1 k1 p1 k1 sm purl to next marker sm p1 k1 p1 k1 continue working all 6 row of the cable chart then move onto row 7 row 7 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 sm knit to the next marker sm p1 k1 p1 k1 row 8 ws p1 k1 p1 k1 sm purl to next marker sm p1 k1 p1 k1 repeat row 3 and 4 until work measures 5inches/13cms from underarm hemline if working using contrast colours knit one row in the colour you intend for your ribbing prior to ribbing this enables a smooth colour change k1 p1 continue across row work this for 1 inch cast off gently in pattern ~~© cathy rubin 2012 australia~~ page 5 of 7 long sleeves put all the stitches on waste yarn on a small diameter circular needle or magic loop knit 2 row cable and tips pick up 3 stitches place marker pick up and knit 3 more stitches 36 if working cable work cable chart repeated across the round changing all purled row into knit row knit 3 5 inches/9cms of stockingette stitch measuring from where the cables short finished 4 5inches from underarm if not doing cable cuff the short sleeved version is without cables even if you worked them for the body of k1 p1 repeat across round the cardigan work this round for 1 inch and then cast off gently in pattern row 1 *p1 k1 repeat to end of round repeat for other sleeve repeat round 1 for one inch cast off gently in pattern repeat for other sleeve ~~© cathy rubin 2012 australia~~ page 6 of 7 ties cable chart crochet four single chain lengths 10inches/25cms long chart crochet chain tutorial link is in reference section attach as follows to your cardigan
